name: LOKI (itch) (EndermaxSokaris)
description:
Lore : 

Danelawgham, 1350, Signy, a young orphan girl surviving in the back alleys of the slums, will become the champion of the god Loki and use her new powers of metamorphosis to meet the demands of the god’s followers and discover her secret past while climbing the social ladder.

The team : (We made it in 4months)
